short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A React-based bookmark sidebar for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GPT Conversation Categorizer

Organize and manage your GPT conversations with ease using our Chrome extension. This tool allows you to categorize your GPT conversations by assigning them to custom group names and creating submenus for quick access. You can effortlessly link and unlink the current page to these submenus, ensuring your important links are always just a click away.

All your categories and links are saved as bookmarks, fully integrated with your Google account. This means you can access your organized conversations and links from any device, anytime, as long as youâ€™re logged into your Google account.

Features:

Custom Grouping: Create custom categories for your GPT conversations.
Quick Links: Add or remove links to the current page with a single click.
Bookmark Integration: Automatically save categories and links as bookmarks in your Google account.
Cross-Device Access: Access your organized bookmarks from any device by logging into your Google account.
Keep your GPT conversations and important links organized and accessible with our Chrome extension!
